name: Chester: The Next Step
description:
Learn about the University of Chester in a light-hearted and entertaining
environment. Players can choose which area they want to play minigames
from: University subjects, Extracurriculars & Sports or a Combination of
everything. Complete short, simple minigames by using a combination of,
tapping on the screen, swiping the screen, tracing the screen, tap and hold
the screen, and not touching the screen.

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

This game was created by a team of level 5 students for a second year collaborative module called Experiential Learning. Students work in teams to create a game for a client. For this project they were asked to create a game to advertise the University of Chester and its courses to prospective students.

CONTROLS

  • Mouse

REQUIREMENTS

  • Chrome, Firefox or another WebGL compatible browser
  • Mouse

TEAM MEMBERS

  • 5 x Level 5 Student who formed Well-Groomed Jellyfish studios.

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.
